analysis.description:
PreTGE.widthraw (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#514-519) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#517-518)

Reentrancy in CommonTokenEvent.calculateAndTransferTokensWithReferrer (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#446-457):
	External calls:
	- tokens = calculateAndTransferTokens(to,investedInWei) (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#448-455)
	- sendReferrerTokens(tokens) (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#455)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- minted (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#455)

CommonTokenEvent.mintAndSendTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#433-435) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(to,amount) (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#434)

CommonTokenEvent.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#469-477) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-alienToken.transfer(to,alienToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#473-477)

Reentrancy in CommonTokenEvent.calculateAndTransferTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#435-446):
	External calls:
	- mintAndSendTokens(to,tokens) (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#442-443)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- invested (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#443-446)

Reentrancy in PreTGE.createTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#523-538):
	External calls:
	- super.calculateAndTransferTokensWithReferrer(msg.sender,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#529-534)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- softcapAchieved (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#536-538)

Reentrancy in Deployer.deploy (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#678-701):
	External calls:
	- preTGE.setPrice(7143000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#680-681)
	- preTGE.setMinPurchaseLimit(100000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#681-682)

	- preTGE.setStart(1517230800) (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#686-687)
	- preTGE.setPeriod(11) (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#687)
	- preTGE.setWallet(0xDFDCAc0c9Eb45C63Bcff91220A48684882F1DAd0) (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#687-690)
	- preTGE.setMaxReferrerTokens(10000000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#691-692)
	- preTGE.setReferrerPercent(10) (/unique_chucks/23/0x13bb437ceb28d37cf1a1f711112d9b111f0a11cb.sol#693)

	External calls:

	State variables written after the call(s):
